content.p: Associate Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr Wan Masliza Wan Mohammad is currently an Associate Professor in Finance, Nottingham University Business School in Malaysia (NUBS). She is also an Associate Fellow of Higher Education Academy (HEA) UK, associate member of Malaysia Institute of Accountant (MIA) and Malaysia Institute of Management (MIM). Wan Masliza current research is in the area Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) and corporate performance, Green Houses Gases (GHG) protocol and corporate disclosure, corporate governance and earnings management. Sustainable Business Practices and Environmental Stewardship International Finance Finance in the Global Market Contemporary Topics in Finance Financial Market Theory and Computation Board gender diversity and Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) performance in the ASEAN region National culture influence on ESG initiative and green innovation Resource use, environmental innovation, and financing access in developed and emerging countries National culture, management effectiveness, corruption,green innovation,government effectiveness and green innovation in emerging and developed economies telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
